mapper.select: SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_NM, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, R.SALIENCE, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.ATTR_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, R.CAMP_ID, DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, R.REG_USRID, M.MEMBER_NAME REG_USRNM, DATE_FORMAT(R.UDT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS UDT_DT, R.UDT_USRID, M1.MEMBER_NAME UDT_USRNM FROM targetai.RULE R LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (R.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M1 ON (R.UDT_USRID = M1.MEMBER_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND RULE_ID = #{ruleId_search} AND REG_USRID = #{ruleRegUsrId_search} AND RULE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ruleNm_search}, '%') ORDER BY RULE_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM targetai.RULE WHERE 1=1 AND RULE_ID = #{ruleId_search} AND REG_USRID = #{ruleRegUsrId_search} AND RULE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ruleNm_search}, '%')

SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_NM, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, R.SALIENCE, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.ATTR_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, R.CAMP_ID, R.TARGET_TYPE, R.REG_DT, R.REG_USRID, R.UDT_DT, R.UDT_USRID FROM targetai.RULE R WHERE R.RULE_ID = #{ruleId}

SELECT RA.RULE_ATTR_ID, RA.RULE_ID, RA.ATTR_WHEN, RA.ATTR_WHEN_CONTENTS, RA.FACTOR_GRP_NM, RA.FACTOR_ID, RA.FACTOR_NM, RA.FACTOR_NM_EN, RA.FACTOR_VAL, RA.LOGICAL, RA.RELATION, F.DATA_TYPE FROM targetai.RULE_ATTR RA LEFT JOIN targetai.FACTOR F ON (RA.FACTOR_ID = F.FACTOR_ID) WHERE RA.RULE_ID = #{pkgId} ORDER BY RULE_ATTR_ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE R WHERE R.RULE_NM = #{ruleNm} AND R.RULE_ID != #{ruleId}
SELECT FACTOR_ID, PID, FACTOR_NM, FACTOR_NM_EN, FACTOR_TYPE FROM targetai.FACTOR WHERE ATTR_USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT FACTOR_ID, PID, FACTOR_NM, FACTOR_NM_EN, FACTOR_TYPE, DATA_TYPE, NUM_OF_GRP, CATEGORY_YN, ATTR_USE_YN FROM targetai.FACTOR WHERE ATTR_USE_YN = 'Y' AND FACTOR_ID = #{factorId}
SELECT FACTOR_ID, VAL FROM targetai.FACTOR_VAL WHERE FACTOR_ID = #{factorId}
SELECT FACTOR_FUNC_ARGS_ID, FACTOR_ID, ARG_NM, `ORDER`, DATA_TYPE, REG_DT FROM targetai.FACTOR_FUNC_ARGS WHERE FACTOR_ID = #{factorId} ORDER BY `ORDER` ASC

SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_NM, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, R.SALIENCE, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.ATTR_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, PRM.PKG_ID, R.CAMP_ID, R.REG_DT FROM targetai.PKG_RULE_MAPPING PRM LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE R ON (PRM.RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID) WHERE PRM.PKG_ID = #{pkgId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO targetai.RULE ( RULE_NM, NO_LOOP, LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, SALIENCE, TARGET_TYPE, PKG_ID, REG_USRID ) VALUES ( #{ruleNm}, #{noLoop}, #{lockOnActive}, #{salience}, #{targetType}, #{pkgId}, #{REG_USER_ID} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO targetai.RULE_ATTR ( RULE_ID, ATTR_WHEN, ATTR_WHEN_CONTENTS, FACTOR_GRP_NM, FACTOR_ID, FACTOR_NM, FACTOR_NM_EN, FACTOR_VAL, LOGICAL, RELATION ) VALUES
( #{ruleId}, #{ruleAttr.ruleAttr_source}, #{ruleAttr.ruleAttr_txt}, #{ruleAttr.factorGrpNm}, #{ruleAttr.factorId}, #{ruleAttr.factorNm}, #{ruleAttr.factorNmEn}, #{ruleAttr.factorVal}, #{ruleAttr.logical_txt}, #{ruleAttr.relation_txt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE targetai.RULE SET RULE_NM = #{ruleNm}, NO_LOOP = #{noLoop}, LOCK_ON_ACTIVE = #{lockOnActive}, SALIENCE = #{salience}, TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType}, PKG_ID = #{pkgId}, UDT_DT = NOW(), UDT_USRID = #{USER_ID} WHERE RULE_ID = #{ruleId}
